ParameterFields.Name: Sight Range (Fives)
ParameterFields.ToolTip: This number multiplied by 5 is the range around the hole it will notice the player and start spawning Rats and/or Bombchus.

ParameterFields.Name: Type
ParameterFields.ToolTip:
The type that spawns just Rats also has the Rat Shopkeeper in it.
The type that spawns both Rats and Bombchus has a random 50% chance of which to spawn each time it spawns one.
